content: this listing is a crochet pattern only file in pdf format but not a finished amigurumi coral reef toy amigurumi crochet coral reef pattern is available in english language us terms ***** this pattern includes 13 pages and more than 60 photos of the detailed description of crocheting assembly and decoration of the coral reef toy including various types of coral such as tube coral artichoke coral and leather coral as well as a carpet anemone and seaweed it also includes instructions for making big and small underwater rocks you can create your own unique coral reefs by combining different corals anemones and seaweed using this pattern feel free to choose the colors and even the length of some corals and rocks to design your coral reef the way you like all the pieces are very easy to make and don t take much time perfect for using up your leftover yarn ***** this pattern is also available for free as an ad-supported online-version on my planet piu blog and as a simplified version in my instagram ***** skill level intermediate materials and tools - yarn sport weight yarn 4ply in gray and dark gray colors for rocks green color for seaweed and any colors you like for corals and anemones used yarn yarnart jeans 160m/50g alize cotton gold 330m/100g - 1 5 mm crochet hook - tapestry needle - pins - stitch markers - scissors - toy stuffing size of the ready toy the size of the finished and assembled big coral reef is approximately 7 5x9 5x4 5 cm 3 0x3 7x1 8 inch if using the indicated yarn ***** this pattern is instant download it means you ll get a link for download to your email address once after payment © copyright all toys patterns and tutorials are copyright tetiana saienko planet piu this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to distribute or copy this pattern or any part of it i do ask you to respect my author s rights thank you for understanding you are allowed to sell or present toys created under this pattern but let your customers know who is the designer of these toys tetiana saienko -
